greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fixed point of "n -> n/2 or (n+1)/2 until result is prime".
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: upp[ n_Integer ] := FixedPoint[ If[ EvenQ[ # ]&&#>2, #/2, If[ PrimeQ[ # ]||(#=== 1), #, (#+1)/2 ] ]&, n, 20 ]
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_
